com.example.java_squad

Class Experiment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.java_squad.Experiment

  • public class Experiment
extends java.lang.Object
    Experiment class. Handles / Models everything for experiments aside from their statistics and questions WIP. Written by Michael Harbidge

      • setPublished

        public void setPublished(boolean published)
        Changes the public visibility of the experiment. Experiment List looks at publicity and lists the experiment if it is published.
        Parameters:
        published - Boolean published (true) or not (false)

      • getPublished

        public void endExperiment()
        Ends the experiment, meaning no more results can be contributed.

      • addSubscriber

        public void addSubscriber(User user)
        subscribes a user to the experiment. Must not already be subscibed to the experiment.
        Parameters:
        user - User to subscribe.

      • removeSubsciber

        public void removeSubsciber(User user)
        unsubscribes a user from the exeperiment. Must be already subscribed.
        Parameters:
        user - User to unsubscribe.

      • addContributor

      • removeContributor

        public void removeContributor(User user)
        removes a user from contributors list. DOES NOT REMOVE THEIR EXPERIMENTS YET
        Parameters:
        user - User to remove.
